data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gateble, Gildas, Munzinger, Jerome (2018): Novitates neocaledonicae X: A very rare and threatened new microendemic species of Acropogon (Malvaceae, Sterculioideae) from New Caledonia. PhytoKeys 110: 1-8, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.110.27599, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.110.27599
